cofh.lib.network.packet

Interface IPacketClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPacket
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexedChatPacket, TileControlPacket, TileGuiPacket, TileRedstonePacket, TileStatePacket

    public interface IPacketClient
extends IPacket
    Packet sent FROM Servers TO Clients

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleClient()
      Handle the packet on the client side.
      default void sendToAllAround(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos, double range, net.minecraft.util.RegistryKey<net.minecraft.world.World> dim)

      Sends this packet to all players around the specified point.

      Sends this packet to all players around the specified point.
      default void sendToChunk(net.minecraft.world.server.ServerWorld world, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
      Sends this packet to all clients watching the chunk.

      Sends this packet to all clients watching the chunk.

      Sends this packet to all clients watching the chunk.
      default void sendToChunk(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity tile)
      Sends this packet to all clients watching the chunk.
      default void sendToClients()
      Sends this packet to all clients on the server.
      default void sendToOps()
      Sends this packet to all server operators.
      default void sendToPlayer(net.minecraft.entity.player.ServerPlayerEntity player)
      Sends this packet to the specified player.

      • sendToChunk

        default void sendToChunk(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity tile)
        Sends this packet to all clients watching the chunk. This method is an overload of sendToChunk(ServerWorld, BlockPos)
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile, used as a reference for the chunk.

      • sendToChunk

        default void sendToChunk(net.minecraft.world.server.ServerWorld world,
                         net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
        Sends this packet to all clients watching the chunk. This method is an overload of sendToChunk(ServerWorld, int, int)
        Parameters:
        world - The world the chunk is in.
        pos - The pos, This is a position of a block, not a chunk.

      • sendToChunk

        default void sendToChunk(net.minecraft.world.server.ServerWorld world,
                         int chunkX,
                         int chunkZ)
        Sends this packet to all clients watching the chunk. This method is an overload of sendToChunk(ServerWorld, ChunkPos)
        Parameters:
        world - The world.
        chunkX - The chunk's X coord.
        chunkZ - The chunk'z Z coord.

      • sendToChunk

        default void sendToChunk(net.minecraft.world.server.ServerWorld world,
                         net.minecraft.util.math.ChunkPos pos)
        Sends this packet to all clients watching the chunk.
        Parameters:
        world - The world.
        pos - The pos.
